title: Depression, stress can lower efficacy of vaccine
author: Neetu Chandra Sharma
description: Researchers said vaccines are less effective when the immune system is weakened by poor physical and mental health
cleaned_text: 07:42 AM IST] Depression, stress can lower efficacy of vaccine Researchers said vaccines are less effective when the immune system is weakened by poor physical and mental health [] Depression, stress, loneliness and poor health can weaken the body's immune system and lower the efficacy of covid-19 vaccines both under development and in early stages of distribution, a research by the Ohio State University, US, has indicated.
